column1: Idahosa died on 12 March 1998. He was survived by his wife
column2: Margaret Idahosa and four children. His wife subsequently took over as the Archbishop of the Church of God Mission International (CGMI)
column4: she is also the Chancellor of Benson Idahosa University.
